alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 23 at 4:23PM MDT until June 23 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 423 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring, mainly on streets in Spearfish. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low- lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Spearfish This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 9 and 20. This includes the following streams and drainages... Beaver Creek, Dry Creek, False Bottom Creek, Little Spearfish Creek, Polo Creek, Spearfish Creek, Spring Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
